keyword: calories in a cup of cottage cheese
title: Calories in a Cup of Cottage Cheese
meta_description: Learn calories in a cup of cottage cheese, plus detailed nutrition facts including protein, carbs, fat, and serving variations for better meal planning.
h1: Calories in a Cup of Cottage Cheese
assumptions: Low-fat (2%) cottage cheese, 1 cup serving (about 225 g), plain and unflavored.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by fat content, brand, curd size, and added ingredients; check labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One cup of low-fat cottage cheese provides about 206 kcal and 25 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cup of low-fat cottage cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 206 kcal for 1 cup of 2% low-fat cottage cheese.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in a cup of cottage cheese?
faqs.a: About 25 g of protein per cup of low-fat cottage cheese.

faqs.q: Does cottage cheese have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 918 mg per cup due to the curding process; opt for low-sodium versions if needed.

faqs.q: How do calories change with fat-free cottage cheese?
faqs.a: Fat-free versions have about 156 kcal per cup, lower in fat but similar protein.

faqs.q: Is a cup of cottage cheese keto-friendly?
faqs.a: Yes, low-carb at 8.2 g carbs per cup, but watch sodium and portion if strict keto.
